macros.sourceContext:
|

The maximum number of static rulesets an extension can have enabled, i.e., the number of values in the declarative_net_request.rule_resources manifest key with "enabled" set to true. Static rulesets exceeding the limit are ignored.

|

An extension can change the number of enabled rulesets using the {{WebExtAPIRef("declarativeNetRequest.updateEnabledRulesets", "updateEnabledRulesets")}} method.

> |

Its value is 10.

{{WebExtExamples("h2")}} ^ |

Browser compatibility

{{Compat}}

title: declarativeNetRequest.MAX_NUMBER_OF_ENABLED_STATIC_RULESETS
summary: The maximum number of static rulesets an extension can have enabled, i.e., the number of values in the declarative_net_request.rule_resources manifest key with "enabled" set to true. Static rulesets exceeding the limit are ignored.
